media.title: AHrT Evil Eye Brand Identity
media.description: Complete brand identity system for AHrT Evil Eye Communications featuring sophisticated typography and mystical aesthetic

media.title: AHrT Evil Eye Brand Applications

sections.title: Illustration & Graphics
sections.description: Creative illustration and graphic design work

media.title: Play Outside - Earth Day Limited Merch Drop
media.description: Eco-themed shirt & tote collection graphic for a one-day-only Earth Day release. Grass-texture backdrop, hand-painted smiling-globe badge, and playful slab-serif headline drive urgency while spotlighting the 'plant-a-mangrove' impact.

media.title: Play Outside Earth Day Carousel - Slide A "For Doing You"
media.description: First frame of the Earth Day launch carousel — split-panel lifestyle shot with halftone accents and oversized slab-serif headline to set the campaign's playful, print-zine tone.

media.title: Play Outside Earth Day Carousel - Slide B "Your Pahrt"
media.description: Second carousel frame that pivots the copy to invite viewers to 'do their pahrt,' featuring a bold arrow swipe, dot-screen texture, and shop call-to-action lock-up.

media.title: Play Outside Earth Day Carousel - Slide C "Hand Pop"
media.description: Dynamic low-angle pose with an outstretched hand plus floating smiley-globe badge and repeat-text wall — designed to stop thumbs mid-scroll.

media.title: Play Outside Earth Day Carousel - Slide D "Thanks For..."
media.description: Closing 'thanks' frame celebrates purchasers by spotlighting the back print and mangrove impact statement; collage arrow guides the eye to the tee mock-up cut-out.

media.title: Play Outside Smiley-Earth Tee - Front Graphic
media.description: Product flatlay of the flagship Earth-Day tee featuring the watercolor smiley globe. Grass-texture backdrop reinforces the outdoors ethos.

media.title: Play Outside Smiley-Earth Tote - Black
media.description: Black canvas tote mock-up with the same smiley-globe mark, overlaid on punchy 'Totelly Awesome' typographic background for social roll-outs.

media.title: Play Outside World-Map Tee - Back Graphic
media.description: Back-print design depicting an illustrated biome map that labels oceans, deserts, and forests — tying the brand's 'protect the places we play' narrative together.

media.title: Play Outside Mangrove Impact Tote - Natural Canvas
media.description: Natural cotton tote bearing the bold statement 'I planted a mangrove tree just by buying this tote,' reinforcing the one-for-one conservation pledge.

media.title: AHrT Micro-Logo Tee - Minimal Front Hit
media.description: Clean chest-hit tee sporting the archival AHrT umbrella mark; shot on faux-grass texture to match the full Earth Day collection aesthetic.

media.title: CDL Safety Guide - Cover "Blind Spot: Danger in Plain Sight"
media.description: High-impact cover for Optimum Staffing's 2025 CDL guide: giant condensed type, halftone dot field, and directional arrow motif instantly communicate urgent road-safety stakes.

media.title: CDL Safety Guide - Spread "Common Blindspots"
media.description: Interior infographic detailing driver- and passenger-side blind zones with isometric truck/car illustration and dashed-lane overlays to visualize real-world risk areas.

media.title: CDL Safety Guide - Spread "Equip Science-Backed Habits"
media.description: Actionable habit checklist—mirror tuning, shoulder checks, 5-8 second scans—paired with a mirror-visibility diagram to reinforce behavior change through clear visuals.

media.title: Play Outside Poster
media.description: Vibrant illustrated poster encouraging outdoor activities with bold typography and dynamic composition

media.title: AHrT Neon Logo Ad – "A New Classic"
media.description: Retro‑arcade promo for the neon‑tube AHrT mark on Champion fleece. Grainy halftone glow, Miami‑Vice palette, and mall atrium backdrop anchor the throwback vibe.

media.title: AHrT Radled Logo Ad – "Feelin‑Radled? Sit Back & Relax"
media.description: Cozy basement‑den scene paired with boxing‑glove glow logo. Warm wood paneling + 70s serif headline signal nostalgic comfort wear.

media.title: AHrT Online‑Now Logo Ad – "Find Your Space"
media.description: Y2K home‑office collage with CRT monitor and pixel‑LED logo evokes early social‑web days—promoting Champion blanks as the modern comfy alternative.

media.title: AHrT Northern Lights Logo Ad – "Witness the Northern Lights"
media.description: Aurora‑borealis backdrop and chromatic flame lettering sell the frost‑ready fleece angle—copy reassures year‑round coziness.
